title: The Nook on Gottingen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Canadian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Neighborhood coffee shop and lounge offering alcoholic beverages and some food. Has soy and almond milk for coffee, a few vegan food choices including chili veggie wrap, chickpea tuna sandwich, and tofu wrap. Prices inexpensive for the small bites.
